name: Fancy-Slider
description: This tool allows users to search for and fetch recommended pictures via a search input. Users can select multiple images, set a timer for automatic slides, and also manually navigate through them with buttons for an interactive experience.

name: Temperature Meter
description: This project fetches real-time weather data, allowing users to search by city and see the current temperature displayed dynamically. A simple yet effective way to check the weather in any location!

name: Phone Hunter
description: This platform allows users to easily find gadgets using a search input. Each phone comes with a detailed modal that provides additional information, helping users make informed decisions while shopping.

name: News Portal
description: This project displays news headlines along with static ratings, author info, and viewer count. I also added buttons for different news categories, and by clicking them, users can fetch relevant news based on the selected category.

name: Lazy's Restu
description: This project allows users to search for meals using a search input. It fetches data from an API and displays various meal options based on the user's query. It's perfect for exploring new recipes or finding dinner ideas!

name: lazy's bar
description: The bar items search project lets users search for their favorite drinks or bar items. The search fetches relevant items from an API and presents them in a clean and responsive layout.

name: Pin Matcher
description: This is a PIN Matcher using HTML, CSS, and DOM manipulation. It's a small but handy feature that helps generate and verify secure 4-digit PINs.

name: Money Expense Tracker
description: This tool helps users track daily expenses. Built with JS to dynamically update expenses and present a simple UI for ease of use.

name: Basic Shopping Cart
description: An enhanced shopping cart with checkout functionalities.

name: Best Five Selection
description: Select and rank your top five choices with ease.

name: Calculator
description: A basic arithmetic calculator built using vanilla JavaScript.
